Package org.cesecore.certificates.ca.extendedservices

Class ExtendedCAService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.internal.UpgradeableDataHashMap
      • org.cesecore.certificates.ca.extendedservices.ExtendedCAService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IUpgradeableData
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CmsCAService, HardTokenEncryptCAService, KeyRecoveryCAService
    public abstract class ExtendedCAService
extends UpgradeableDataHashMap
implements Serializable
    ExtendedCAService base class. An implementing class MUST have a constructor taking a ExtendedCAServiceInfo as argument.
    Version:
    $Id: ExtendedCAService.java 21842 2015-09-12 20:54:36Z aveen4711 $
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setStatus

      • getStatus

        protected int getStatus()
        Returns:
        status

      • setCA

        public final void setCA​(CA aCa)
        Method called by the CA before using the service with #extendedService. Used to (temporarily) give the service access to CA keys, certificates etc that might be needed for the service to run perform its service.
        Parameters:
        aCa - the CA from which the service can use private keys to generate service certificates etc.

      • getCa

        public final CA getCa()
        Returns:
        CA

      • init

        public abstract void init​(CryptoToken cryptoToken,
                          CA aCa,
                          AvailableCustomCertificateExtensionsConfiguration cceConfig)
                   throws Exception
        Initializes the ExtendedCAService the first time it is created. Only used when the CA service is created the first time, usually this is when the CA is created, or the service of the CA is renewed.
        Parameters:
        cryptoToken - token
        aCa - the CA from which the service can use private keys to generate service certificates etc. This must not be stored.
        cceConfig - containing a list of available custom certificate extensions
        Throws:
        Exception - on error

      • update

        public abstract void update​(CryptoToken cryptoToken,
                            ExtendedCAServiceInfo info,
                            CA aCa,
                            AvailableCustomCertificateExtensionsConfiguration cceConfig)
        Update the ExtendedCAService data.
        Parameters:
        cryptoToken - token
        info - contains information used to activate the service.
        aCa - CA
        cceConfig - config

      • getExtendedCAServiceInfo

        public abstract ExtendedCAServiceInfo getExtendedCAServiceInfo()
        Method used to retrieve information about the service.
        Returns:
        info

      • extendedService

        public abstract ExtendedCAServiceResponse extendedService​(CryptoToken cryptoToken,
                                                          ExtendedCAServiceRequest request)
                                                   throws ExtendedCAServiceRequestException,
                                                          IllegalExtendedCAServiceRequestException,
                                                          ExtendedCAServiceNotActiveException,
                                                          CertificateEncodingException,
                                                          CertificateException,
                                                          org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException
        Method used to perform the service.
        Parameters:
        cryptoToken - token
        request - request
        Returns:
        response
        Throws:
        ExtendedCAServiceRequestException - on error
        IllegalExtendedCAServiceRequestException - on illegal action
        ExtendedCAServiceNotActiveException - if service is inactive or unreachable
        org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException - if creation fails
        CertificateException - if certificate is invalid
        CertificateEncodingException - if certificate cannot be parsed

      • getServiceName

        public String getServiceName()
        Returns:
        Service name.
